message: The INST_MANDATE field for indicator 16-9-1, translated into all languages

data.en: UNICEF is responsible for global monitoring and reporting on the wellbeing of children. It provides technical and financial assistance to Member States to support their efforts to collect quality data on birth registration, including through the UNICEF-supported MICS household survey programme. UNICEF also compiles birth registration statistics with the goal of making internationally comparable datasets publicly available, and it analyses birth registration statistics which are included in relevant data-driven publications, including in its flagship publication, The State of the World’s Children.
